from iturtle import Turtle

turtle = Turtle()
turtle.pencolor("gold")

    turtle.forward(300)
    turtle.left(170)

children.value:
from iturtle import Turtle

turtle = Turtle()

colors=["red", "blue", "yellow", "brown", "black", "purple", "green"]

turtle.speed(1)

turtle.penup()
turtle.forward(20)
turtle.left(90)
turtle.forward(140)
turtle.right(90)
turtle.pendown()

for i in range (0,18):
    turtle.pencolor(colors[i%7])
    turtle.right(20)
    turtle.forward(50)
    
turtle.right(180)
turtle.home()
